Type SpecificationController<TSubject>

Namespace Machine.Fakes.Sdk

Interfaces IFakeAccessor, IDisposable

Controller that implements all the core capabilities of Machine.Fakes. This includes filling a subject with fakes and providing all the handy helper methods for interacting with fakes in a specification.

Public instance methods

void Dispose()

Performs cleanup. Exuecutes the Cleanup functionality of all configured behavior configs.

void EnsureSubjectCreated()

Ensures that the subject has been created. This will trigger the lazy loading in case creation hasn't happened before.

TBehaviorConfig With<TBehaviorConfig>()

Configures the specification to execute a behavior config before the action on the subject is executed ( Because ).
The class specified by needs to have private fields assigned with either OnEstablish or OnCleanup delegates.

Public properties

TSubject Subject get; set;

Gives access to the subject under specification. On first access the spec tries to create an instance of the subject type by itself. Override this behavior by manually setting a subject instance.
